features: LIVE A HEALTHIER LIFE: Mini Portable Washing Machine is specially designed for delicate and small items, ideal for washing light clothes that need to be cleaned separately. Solve laundry troubles, The mini washer is a better choice for you.Improve the quality of your life.

WASHING AND DRYING: This folding washing machine is integrated with washing and drying, multipurpose, small in size, but fully functional.It is very suitable for washing baby clothing, children clothing, underwear, socks, towels, etc. Effectively remove, and make your clothes clean.

SAFE AND ENERGY SAVING: Portable washer machine using TPE and food grade silicone material is a great choice for your personal items, baby items, patients families! The washing machine requires only 0.01 kWh of electricity for 1 hour, which can save you more time, money and energy, and say goodbye to laundry troubles.

FOLDING DESIGN: The bucket washing machine folds in a compact size of 11.8 x 11.8 x 4.7 IN so you can easily carry it out and conveniently wash clothes outdoors.Perfect for camping, travelling, vacation, business trip, apartments, dorms, RV.

EASY TO USE: One button to control the washing machine, easy to use, just touch the button for two seconds to start the washing machine. The smart touch screen design allows you to freely choose the time you want, and the operation is simple and convenient for the elderly and children. If you encounter any damage to the product accessories, please contact us, and we will replace you with new accessories.
body.description: DESCRIPTION Product Name: Mini Folding Washing MachineProduct specifications: 8.7*8.7*11.8 INRated voltage: 100V-240V Rated power: 12WProduct weight: 4 LBFolding method: press down and fold.Volume:6.5 LHow to use: Press and hold for two seconds to turn on or off the machine, and switch a mode with each touch (3 minutes of spin dry / 10 minutes of wash / 5 minutes of wash)Package includeds:1 x washer1 x Removable drying basket1 x Manual1 x AdapterPRODUCT FEATURES 1.Upgrade 6.5L large capacity mini washing machine, it can help wash your small clothes, no longer need to wash by hand, making the clothes cleaner and gives the baby the greatest care.2.The mini washing machine uses a high-powered motor to remove dirt more efficiently. Make clothes cleaner.3.The newly upgraded detachable drain basket, one-button drain, simple operation, can be dried after washing.4. Soft glue is used in the fold, which is not easy to be damaged and easy to carry. Wash your clothes whenever and whenever you want.NOTES 1.It is not suitable for washing large and heavy clothes such as jeans2.When washing clothes, please do not put too much water. If you put too much water, when the washing machine is started, the momentum of the water will flush the cover open, causing the water to splash everywhere.3.If you encounter any damage to the product accessories, please message us, and we will replace you with new accessories. The product manual is in Chinese. We can give you the English version.
